S04n550:3: $1 evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati sma ,
S04n550:4: āmrapālīvane mahatā bhikṣusamghena sārdham aṣṭābhir bhikṣusahasraiḥ ,
S04n550:5: $2 sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptaiḥ ,
S04n550:6: $3 dvātriṃśatā ca bodhisatvasahasrair abhijñānābhijñātaiḥ sarvair mahābhijñāparikarmaniryātaiḥ ,
S04n550:51: $4 tadyathā samadarśinā ca nāma bodhisatvena mahāsatvena,
S04n550:108: anekāc caturmahādvīpakāl lokadhātor abhyāgatair bhagavato darśanāyai vandanāyai paryupāsanāyai dhramaśravaṇāya ca / te tatraīva parṣadi samnipatitāḥ / dvādaśa ca śakrasahasrāṇy anyānyebhyaś caturmahādvīpakebhyo 'bhyāgatāni tatraīva parṣadi samnipatitāny abhūvan / tathānye 'pi maheśākhyamaheśākhyāḥ śakrabrahmalokapāladevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragās tatraīva parṣadi samnipatitā abhūvan samniṣaṇṇāḥ / tathā catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāś copasamkrāntā abhūvan /
S04n550:109: $6 tatra bhagavān anekaśatasahasrayā praṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma / sumerur iva parvatarājaḥ sāgaramadhyād abhyudgataḥ sarvaparṣadam abhibhūya bhāsate tapati virocate śrīgarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04n550:110: $7 atha ratnākaro bodhisatvo licchavikumāraḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair licchavikumāraśataiḥ saptaratnamayāni cchatrāṇi gṛhītvā vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ niṣkramya yenāmrapālīvanaṃ yena ca bhagavāṃs tenopasamkrāmat / upasamkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya yathā parigṛhītais taiś chatrair bhagavantam abhicchādayuati sma / abhicchādyaikānte sthito 'bhūt /
S04n550:111: $8 samantaraniḥsṛṣtāni ca tāni ratnacchatrāṇy atha tāvad eva buddhānubhāvenaikaṃ mahāratnacchatraṃ saṃsthitam / tena ca mahāratnacchatreṇāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ sarvaḥ samchāditaḥ samdṛśyate sma / yaś cāsmiṃs trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv āyāmavistāraḥ,
S04n550:112: sa tasmin mahāratnacchatre samdṛśyate sma / ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sumeravo mahāparvatarājā himavanmucilindamahāmucilindagandhamādanaratnaparvatā vā cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ,
S04n550:113: te 'pi sarve tasminn evaikamahāratnacchatre samdṛśyante sma / ye 'pīha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mahāsamudrā vā sarastaḍāgāni vā nadīkunadyaḥ sravantyo vā pravahanti,
S04n550:114: tā api sarvās tasminn evaikamahāratnacchatre samdṛśyante sma / yāny apīha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sūryācandramasāṃ vimānāni tārārūpāṇi vā devabhavanāni vā nāgabhavanāni vā yakṣabhavanāni vā gandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragabhavanāni vā cāturmahārājabhavanāni vā grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānyo vā,
S04n550:115: tāny api sarvāṇi tasminn evaikamahāratnacchatre samdṛśyante sma / yāpi ca daśadiśi loke buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā pravartate,
S04n550:116: sāpi tasmād evaikamahāratnacchatrān niścarantī śrūyate sma /
S04n550:117: $9 tatra sā sarvā parṣad āścaryaprāptā bhagavato 'ntikād idam evaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭodagrāttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā tathāgataṃ namasyatī sthitānimiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇā /
S04n550:118: $10 atha khalu ratnākaro licchavikumāro bhagavato 'ntikād idam evaṃrūpaṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvaikāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhir abhyaṣṭāvīt:
S04n550:128: dharmaṃ dhanaṃ ca dadase jagato jitāre /
S04n550:131: na ca nāma asti na ca nāsti giraṃ prabhāṣi
S04n550:133: naivātra ātmana ca kāraku vedako vā
S04n550:134: na ca karmu naśyati śubhaṃ aśubhaṃ ca kimcit // 4 //
S04n550:150: ko nāma satvaratane 'smi na kuryu pūjām // 8 //
S04n550:179: $11 atha ratnākaro licchavikumāro bhagavantam ābhir gāthābhir abhiṣṭutya bhagavantam etad avocat :
S04n550:180: imāni bhagavan pañcamātrāṇi licchavikumāraśatāni sarvāṇy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāni / tāni cemāni buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ paripṛcchanti - katamā bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhir iti / tat sādhu bhagavan deśayatu tathāgato 'mīṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhim /
S04n550:181: evam ukte bhagavān ratnākarāya licchavikumārāya sādhukāram adāt :
S04n550:182: sādhu sādhu kumāra / sādhu khalu punas tvaṃ kumāra yas tvaṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhim ārabhya tathāgataṃ paripṛcchasi / tena hi kumāra śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru / bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te yathā bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhim ārabhya /
S04n550:183: sādhu bhagavan iti ratnākaro licchavikumāras tāni ca pañcamātrāṇi licchavikumāraśatāni bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ /
S04n550:185: $12 satvakṣetraṃ kulaputra bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram / tat kasya hetoḥ / yāvantaṃ bodhisatvaḥ satveṣūpacayaṃ karoti tāvad buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti / yādṛśaḥ satvānāṃ vinayo bhavati tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti / yādṛśena buddhakṣetrāvatāreṇa satvā buddhajñānam avataranti tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti / yādṛśena buddhakṣetrāvatāreṇa satvānām āryākārāṇīdriyāṇy utpadyante tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ parigṛhṇāti / tat kasya hetoḥ / satvārthanirjātaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisatvānāṃ buddhakṣetram /tadyathā ratnākara yādṛśam icched ākāśaṃ māpayituṃ tādṛśaṃ māpayeta,
S04n550:186: na cākāśaṃ śakyate māpayituṃ nāpy alamkartum / evaṃ eva ratnākara ākāśasamān sarvadharmāñ jñātvā,
S04n550:187: yādṛśam icched bodhisatvaḥ satvaparipākāya buddhakṣetraṃ māpayituṃ tādṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ māpayati,
S04n550:188: na ca buddhakṣetrākāśatā śakyaṃ māpayituṃ nāpy alamkartum /
S04n550:191: tasya bodhiprāptasyāśaṭhā amāyāvinaḥ satvā buddhakṣetra upapadyante /
S04n550:193: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśalasaṃbhāropacitāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:195: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvakuśaladharmopasthitāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetra upāpadyante /
S04n550:197: tasya bodhiprāptasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:199: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvaparityāginaḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:201: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvābhiprāyasaṃpannā deśakuśalakarmapathasaṃrakṣakāḥ satvās tatra buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:203: tasya bodhiprāptasya dvātriṃśallakṣanālamkṛtāḥ kṣāṇtidamaśamathapāramiprāptāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:205: tasya bodhiprāptasya sravakuśalaparyeṣṭiṣv ārabdhavīryāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:207: tasya bodhiprāptasya smṛtisaṃprajanyasamāhitāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:209: tasya bodhiprāptasya samyaktvaniyatāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:211: tasya bodhiprāptasya maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāvihāriṇaḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:213: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvavimuktisamgṛhītāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:215: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvopāyamīmāṃsākuśalāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:221: tasya bodhiprāptasya sarvāpāyasamucchinnam aṣṭākṣaṇavigataṃ buddhkṣetraṃ saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:222: svayaṃ śikṣāpadeṣu vartamānā parāpattyacodanatā bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetram,
S04n550:225: tasya bodhiprāptasya niyatāyuṣo mahābhogā brahmacāriṇaḥ satyānuparivartinyā vācālamskṛtā madhuravacanā abhinnaparṣado bhinnasamdhānakuśalā īrṣyāvigatā avyāpannacittāḥ samyagdṛṣṭisamanvāgatāḥ satvā buddhakṣetre saṃbhavanti /
S04n550:227: yāvanto bodhisatvasya prayogās tāvanta āśayāḥ / yāvanta āśayās tāvanto 'dhyāśayāḥ / yāvanto 'dhyāśayās tāvantyo nidhyaptayaḥ / yāvantyo nidhyaptayas tāvantyaḥ pratipattayaḥ / yāvantyaḥ pratipattayas tāvantyaḥ pariṇāmanāḥ / yāvantyaḥ pariṇāmanās tāvanta upāyāḥ / yāvanta upāyās tāvantyaḥ kṣetrapariśuddhayaḥ / yādṛśī kṣetrapariśuddhis tādṛśī satvāpariśuddhiḥ / yādṛśī satvapariśuddhis tādṛśī jñānapariśuddhiḥ / yādṛśī jñānapariśuddhis tādṛśī deśanāpariśuddhiḥ / yādṛśī deśanāpariśuddhis tādṛśī jñānapratipattipariśuddhiḥ / yādṛśī jñānapratipattipariśuddhis tādṛśī svacittapariśuddhiḥ /
S04n550:228: tasmāt tarhi kulaputra buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayitukāmena bodhisatvena svacittapariśodhane yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ / tat kasya hetoḥ / yādṛśī bodhisatvasya cittapariśuddhis tādṛśī buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ saṃbhavati /
S04n550:230: yadi yādṛśī cittapariśuddhis tādṛśī bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ saṃbhavati,
S04n550:231: tan mā āhaiva bhagavataḥ śākyamuner bodhisatvacaryāṃ carataś cittam apariśuddhaṃ yenedaṃ buddhakṣetram evam apariśuddhaṃ samdṛśyate /
S04n550:232: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat :
S04n550:234: śarīputra mā āhaiva sūryācandramasāv apariśuddhau yaj jātyandho na paśyati /
S04n550:235: āha : no hīdam bhagavan jātyandhāparādha eṣa na sūryacandramasoḥ /
S04n550:236: āha : evam eva śāriputra satvānām ajñānāparādha eṣa yas tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraguṇālamkāravyūhaṃ kecit satvā na paśyanti,
S04n550:237: na tatra tathāgatasyāparādhaḥ / pariśuddhaṃ hi śāriputra tathāgatasya buddhakṣetraṃ yūyaṃ punar idaṃ na paśyatha /
S04n550:238: $16 atha khalu jaṭī brahmā sthaviraṃ śāriputram etad avocat :
S04n550:239: mā bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatasyāpariśuddhaṃ buddhakṣetram idaṃ vyāhārṣīt / pariśuddhaṃ hi bhadantaśāriputra bhagavato buddhakṣetram / tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra vaśavartināṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāḥ / īdṛśān vayaṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ paśyāmaḥ /
S04n550:240: atha khalu sthaviraḥ śāriputro jaṭinaṃ brahmāṇam etad avocat :
S04n550:241: vayaṃ punar brahman imāṃ mahāpṛthivīm utkūlanikūlāṃ kaṇṭakaprapātagiriśekharaśvabhragūthoḍigallapratipūrṇāṃ paśyāmaḥ /
S04n550:243: nūnaṃ bhadantaśāriputrasyotkūlanikūlaṃ cittam apariśuddhabuddhajñānāśayaṃ yenedṛśaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ paśyasi / ye punas te bhadantaśāriputra bodhisatvāḥ sarvasatvasamacittāḥ pariśuddhabuddhajñānāśayās te imaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśuddhaṃ paśyanti /
S04n550:244: $17 atha bhagavān pādāṇguṣṭhena imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ parāhanti sma / atha khalu tasmin samaye 'yaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur anekaratnaśatasahasrasamcito 'nekaratnaśatasahasrapratyarpitaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt / tadyathāpi nāma ratnavyūhasya tathāgatasyānantaguṇaratnavyūho lokadhātus tādṛśo 'yaṃ lokadhātuḥ samdṛśyante sma / tatra sā sarvāvatī parṣad āścaryaprāptā ratnapadmaniṣaṇṇam ātmānaṃ samjānīte sma /
S04n550:245: $18 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma:
S04n550:247: āha : paśyāmi bhagavan adṛṣṭāśrutapūrvā ime vyūhāḥ samdṛśyante /
S04n550:248: āha : idṛśaṃ mama śāriputra sadā buddhakṣetram / hīnasatvaparipākāya tu tathāgata evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ buddhakṣetram upadarśayati / tadyathā śāriputra devaputrāṇām ekapātryāṃ bhuñjānānāṃ yathā puṇyopacayaviśeṣeṇa sudhādevabhojanam upatiṣṭhataḥ,
S04n550:249: evam eva śāriputra ekabuddhakṣetropapannā yathā cittapariśuddhyā satvā buddhānāṃ buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān paśyanti /
S04n550:250: $19 asmin khalu punar buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhālamkāre samdarśyamāne caturaśīteḥ prāṇisahasrāṇām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni / yāni ca tāni ratnākareṇa licchavikumāreṇa sārdhaṃ pañca licchavikumāraśatāny āgatāni teṣām apy ānulomikyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04n550:251: $20 atha bhagavān punar eva tām ṛddhiṃ pratisaṃharati sma / tataḥ punar evedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ tatsvabhāvam eva saṃvṛtam,
S04n550:252: tatra śrāvakayānikāṇāṃ devamanuṣyānāṃ - anityā bata ime sarvasaṃskārā iti viditvā dvātriṃśatā prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajovigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham / aṣṭānāṃ ca bhikṣusahasrāṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni / caturaśīteś ca prāṇisahasrāṇām udārabuddhadharmādhimuktānāṃ - viṭhapanapratyupasthānalakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā iti viditvānuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni //
S04n550:255: $1 tena khalu punaḥ samayena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ vimalakīrtir nāma licchaviḥ prativasati sma / pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ,
S04n550:277: sa satvaparipākāyopāyakauśalyena vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ prativasati sma /
S04n550:278: $2 akṣayabhogo daridrānāthasatvasamgrahāya / pariśuddhaśīlo duḥśīlasamgrahāya / kṣamadamaprāpto duṣṭavyāpannakrudhacittānāṃ satvānāṃ samgrahāya / uttaptavīryaḥ kusīdānāṃ satvānāṃ samgrahāya / dhyānasmṛtisamādhisthito vibhrāntacittānāṃ satvānāṃ samgrahāya / prajñāniścayaprāpto duḥprajñānāṃ satvānāṃ samgrahāya /
S04n550:279: $3 avadātavastradhārī śramaṇeryāpathasaṃpannaḥ / gṛhavāsasthitaḥ kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ / bhāryāputradārāṃś ca samdarśayati,
S04n550:280: sadā ca brahmacārī / parivāraparivṛtaś ca bhavati,
S04n550:281: sadā ca vivekacārī / ābharaṇavibhūṣitaś ca samdṛśyate,
S04n550:283: sadā ca dhyānāhāraḥ / sarvadyūtakaraśālāsu ca samdṛśyate,
S04n550:287: sadā ca dharmārāmaratirataḥ / sarvasamgaṇikāsu ca samdṛśyate,
S04n550:293: sarvadharmaśravaṇasāmkathyeṣu ca samdṛśyate hīnayānavicchandanāya mahāyāne samādāpanatayā /
S04n550:308: iti hi vimalakīrtir licchavir evam apramāṇopāyakauśalajñānasamanvāgato vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ prativasati sma /
S04n550:309: $7 sa upāyakauśalyena glānam ātmānam upadarśayati sma / tasya glānasya vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ rājarājamahāmātrāmātyakumārapāriṣadyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ śreṣṭhinaigamajānapadās tadanyāni ca bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi glānaparipṛcchakāny upasamkrāmanti sma /
S04n550:310: $8 teṣām upasamkrāntānāṃ vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ / imam eva cāturmahābhautikaṃ kāyam ārabhya dharmaṃ deśayati sma :
S04n550:321: evaṃ bahurogabhājano 'yaṃ mārṣāḥ kāyaḥ / tatra paṇḍitena niśrayo na kartavyaḥ /
S04n550:349: tatra yuṣmābhir evaṃrūpe kāye nirvidvirāga utpādayitavyas tathāgatakāye ca spṛhotpādayitavyā /
S04n550:350: $12 dharmakāyo hi mārṣāḥ tathāgatakāyo dānanirjātaḥ śīlanirjātaḥ samādhinirjātaḥ prajñānirjāto vimuktinirjāto vimuktijñānadarśananirjātaḥ / maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣānirjātaḥ / dānadamasaṃyamanirjātaḥ kṣāntisauratyanirjāto dṛḍhavīryakuśalamūlanirjāto dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattinirjātaḥ śrutaprajñopāyanirjātaḥ / saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyanirjātaḥ śamathavidarśanānirjāto daśabalanirjātaś caturvaiśāradyanirjātaḥ / aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmanirjātaḥ sarvapāramitānirjātaḥ / abhijñāvidyānirjātaḥ sarvākuśaladharmaprahāṇāya nirjātaḥ sarvakuśaladharmaparigrahanirjātaḥ satyanirjāto bhūtanirjāto 'pramādanirjātaḥ / apramāṇaśubhakarmanirjāto mārṣāḥ tathāgatakāyas tatra yuṣmābhiḥ spṛhā kartavyā / sarvasatvānāṃ ca sarvakleśavyādhiprahāṇāyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayitavyāni /
S04n550:351: $13 evaṃ vimalakīrtir licchavis tathā samnipatitānāṃ teṣāṃ glānaparipṛchakānāṃ tathā tathā dharmaṃ deśayati yad bahūni satvaśatasahasrāṇy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayanti //
S04n550:356: na ca māṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samanvāharati,
S04n550:357: na ca me glānaparipṛcchakaṃ kamcit preṣayaty anukampām upādāya /
S04n550:358: $2 samanvāhṛtaś ca bhagavatā vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ / atha bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:359: gaccha tvaṃ śāriputra vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:360: evam ukta āyuṣmāñ śāriputro bhagavantam etad avocat :
S04n550:361: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasya hetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:363: vimalakīrtiś ca licchavir yena tad vṛkṣamūlaṃ tenopasamkramya mām etad avocat :
S04n550:364: $3 na bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ pratisaṃlayanaṃ saṃlātavyaṃ yathā tvaṃ pratisaṃlīnaḥ / api tu tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā traidhātuke na kāyaś cittaṃ vā samdṛśyate / tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā nirodhāc ca na vyutiṣṭhasi sarveryāpatheṣu ca samdṛśyase / tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā prāptilakṣaṇaṃ ca na vijahāsi pṛthagjanalakṣaṇeṣu ca samdṛśyase / tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā te na cādhyātmaṃ cittam avasthitaṃ bhaven na bahirdhopavicaret / tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā sarvadṛṣṭigatebhyaś ca na calasi saptatriṃśatsu ca bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu samdṛśyase / tathā pratisaṃlīyaś ca yathā saṃsārāvacarāṃś ca kleśān na prajahāsi nirvāṇasamavasaraṇaś ca bhavasi / ye bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ pratisaṃlayanaṃ pratisaṃlīyante teṣāṃ bhagavān pratisaṃlayanam anujānāti /
S04n550:365: $4 so 'haṃ bhagavan etāṃ śrutvā tūṣṇīm evābhūvam / na tasya śaknomy uttare prativacanaṃ dātum / tan nāham utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:366: $5 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:367: gaccha tvaṃ maudgalyāyana vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:369: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasya hetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:370: ekasmin samaye vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamasmin vīthīmukhe gṛhapatibhyo dharmaṃ deśayāmi / tatra māṃ vimalakīrtir licchavir upasamkrāmyaivam āha :
S04n550:371: $6 na bhadantamaudgalyāyana gṛhibhyo 'vadātavasanebhya evaṃ dharmo deśayitavyo yathā bhadanto deśayati / api tu tathā bhadantamaudgalyāyana dharmo deśayitavyo yathaiva sa dharmaḥ / dharmo hi bhadantamaudgalyāyana asatvaḥ sarvarajovigataḥ,
S04n550:398: $7 īdṛśasya bhadantamahāmaudgalyāyana dharmasya kīdṛśī deśanā / dharmadeśaneti bhadantamahāmaudgalyāyana samāropapadam etat / ye 'pi śṛṇvanti te 'pi samāropenaiva śṛṇvanti / yatra bhadantamaudgalyāyana asamāropapadaṃ na tatra deśyate na śrūyate na vijñāyate / tadyathā māyāpuruṣo māyāpuruṣebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04n550:399: $8 evaṃ hi cittāvasthānena dharmo deśayitavyaḥ / satvendriyakuśalena ca te bhavitavyam,
S04n550:400: sudṛṣṭaprajñādarśanena mahākaruṇāmukhībhūtena mahāyānasaṃvarṇakena budhekṛtajñena śuddhāśayena dharmaniruktividhijñena,
S04n550:402: $9 tena bhagavan tathā tathā dharmo deśito yathā tato gṛhapatiparṣado 'ṣṭānāṃ gṛhapatiśatānām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni / ahaṃ ca niṣpratibhāno 'bhūvam / tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparupṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:403: $10 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapam āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:404: gaccha tvaṃ mahākāśyapa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:406: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan daridravīthyāṃ piṇḍāya carāmi / tatra māṃ vimalakīrtir licchavir upasamkramyaivam āha :
S04n550:408: yan mahākulāny utsṛjya daridrakulāny upasamkrāmasi / api tu bhadantamahākāśyapa dharmasamatāpratiṣṭhitena te bhavitavyam / sarvadā sarvasatvasamanvāhāreṇa piṇḍapātaḥ paryeṣṭavyaḥ / anāhāreṇa cāhāraḥ paryeṣṭavyaḥ / parapiṇḍagrāhāpanayāya ca te piṇḍāya caritavyam / śūnyagrāmādhiṣṭhitena ca grāmaḥ praveṣṭavyaḥ / naranārīparipākāya ca te nagaraṃ praveṣṭavyam / buddhakulakulīnena ca te kulāny upasamkramitavyāni /
S04n550:409: $12 apratigrahaṇatayā ca piṇḍapātaḥ pratigrāhyaḥ / jātyandhasamatayā ca rūpāṇi draṣṭavyāni / pratiśrutakopamatayā ca śabdāḥ śrotavyāḥ / vātasamatayā ca gandhā ghrātavyāḥ / avijñaptito rasā āsvādayitavyāḥ / jñānāsparśanatayā ca sparśāḥ spraṣṭavyāḥ / māyāpuruṣavijñāptyā ca dharmā vijñātavyāḥ / yo 'svabhāvo parabhāvaś ca tad anujjvalitam / yad anujjvalitaṃ tan na śāmyati /
S04n550:410: $13 yadi sthaviro mahākāśyapo 'ṣṭau ca mithyātvāni samatikrāmet,
S04n550:414: sarvabuddhān sarvāryāṃś ca pratipādya paścād ātmanā paribhuñjīta,
S04n550:415: tathā ca paribhuñjīta yathā na samkleśo na vigatakleśaḥ,
S04n550:417: na saṃsārasthito na nirvāṇasthitaḥ paribhuñjīta / ye ca bhadantāya piṇḍapātaṃ dadati te teṣāṃ nālpaphalaṃ na mahāphalaṃ bhavet,
S04n550:418: na ca hānāya na viśeṣāya gacchet,
S04n550:419: buddhagatisamavasaraṇāya ca bhaveta na śrāvakagatisamavasaraṇāya / evaṃ sthaviro mahākāśyapo 'moghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjīta /
S04n550:420: $14 so 'haṃ bhagavan imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sarvabodhisatvān namasyāmi / gṛhiṇo 'pi nāmaivaṃrūpaṃ pratibhānam,
S04n550:421: ko 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpādayet / tataḥ prabhṛti me na kaścit satvaḥ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā samādāpitapūrvo 'nyatra mahāyānāt / tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:422: $15 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:423: gaccha tvaṃ subhūte vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:425: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasya hetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:426: ekasmin samaye vaiśālyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ piṇḍāya carāmi,
S04n550:427: vimalakīrter licchaver niveśanaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ / tasya me vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ pātraṃ gṛhitvā praṇītena bhojanena pratipūryaivam āha :
S04n550:428: $16 sacet tvaṃ bhadantasubhūte āmiṣasamatayā sarvadharmasamatām anugataḥ sarvadharmasamatayā ca buddhadharmasamatām anugata eva,
S04n550:429: tvam imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva / sacet tvaṃ bhadantasubhūte na rāgadoṣamohaprahīṇo na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvasasi / saced evam asy avikopya satkāyam ekāyanaṃ mārgam anugataḥ / na ca te 'vidyā bhavatṛṣṇā ca samudghātitā na ca vidyāvimuktī utpādite / ānantaryasamatayā ca te samādhivimuktiḥ / na cāsi mukto na baddhaḥ / na ca te catvāry āryasatyāni dṛṣṭāni na ca na dṛṣṭasatyaḥ / na prāptaphalo na pṛthagjanasamavasaraṇaḥ / na cāsy āryo nānāryaḥ / na sarvadharmasamanvāgataś ca sarvadharmasamadhigataś ca /
S04n550:430: $17 na ca te śāstā dṛṣṭo na dharmaḥ śruto na samghaḥ paryupāsitaḥ / ye ca te ṣaṭ śāstāras tadyathā pūraṇaḥ kāśyapaḥ,
S04n550:436: te ca bhadantasya śāstāras tāṃś ca niśritya pravarjito yadgāminas te ṣaṭ śāstāras tadgāmy evāryasubhūtiḥ,
S04n550:438: aṣṭākṣaṇasamavasaraṇaś cāsi na cāsi lakṣaṇam anuprāptaḥ,
S04n550:440: yā ca sarvasatvānām araṇā sā bhadantasyāpy araṇā,
S04n550:442: ye ca bhadantāya piṇḍapātaṃ dadati tāṃś ca vinipātayasi,
S04n550:443: sarvamāraiś ca te sārdham ekahastaḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04n550:450: na ca jātu parinirvāsyasi / evaṃ tvam imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pratigṛhīṇa /
S04n550:451: $19 tasya me bhagavan imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvāndhakāraprāptā diśo 'bhūvan - tat kim asmai nirdiśāmi,
S04n550:452: kathaṃ vā pratipadya iti / so 'haṃ tat pātram utsṛjya tato gṛhān niṣkramiṣyāmīti /
S04n550:455: pratigṛhāṇedaṃ pātram / tat kim manyase bhadantasubhūte,
S04n550:456: yadi tathāgatanirmita evam ucyeta kaccit sa uttraset /
S04n550:460: nirmitamāyāsvabhāvebhyo bhadantasubhūte sarvadharmebhyo nottrasitavyam / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / sarvāṇi hi tāni vacanāni tatsvabhāvāni,
S04n550:461: evaṃ paṇḍitā akṣareṣu na sajjanti na tebhya uttrasyanti / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / sarvāṇi tāny akṣarāṇy anakṣarāṇi sthāpayitvā vimuktiṃ vimuktilakṣaṇāṃś ca sarvadharmān /
S04n550:462: $20 iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne dvayor devaputraśatayor virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham,
S04n550:463: pañcānāṃ ca devaputraśatānām ānulomikyāḥ kṣānteḥ pratilambho 'bhūt / ahaṃ ca niṣpratibhāno 'bhūvam,
S04n550:464: na cāsya śaknomy uttare prativacanaṃ dātum / tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:465: $21 atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputram āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:466: gaccha tvaṃ pūrṇa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:468: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:469: ekasmin samaye vanasyānyatamasmin pṛthivīpradeśa ādikarmikāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi .
S04n550:470: tatra vimalakīrtir licchavir upasamkramya mām evam āha :
S04n550:471: $22 samāpadya bhadantapūrṇa eteṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cittaṃ vyavalokya dharmaṃ deśaya / mā mahāratnabhājaneṣu prati kulmāṣān prākṣaipsīḥ / jānīṣva tāvat kimāśayā ete bhikṣava iti / mā vaidūryaratnaṃ kācamaṇikaiḥ samānīkārṣīḥ / mā bhadantapūrṇa apratyavekṣya satvendriyeṣu prādeśikendriyatvam upasaṃhārṣīḥ / mā akṣatāṃ kṣiṇuṣva / mā mahāmārgam avatartukāmān bhaṇḍarathyāṃ praveśaya / mā mahāsāgaraṃ goṣpade praveśaya / mā sūryaprabhāṃ khadyotakair nirvartaya / mā saṃhanādasaṃprasthitān sṛgālanāde niyojaya / api bhadantapūrṇa sarve hy ete bhikṣavo mahāyānasaṃprasthitā amuṣitabodhicittāḥ / teṣāṃ bhadantapūrṇa mā śrāvakayānam upadarśaya / kaṣṭaṃ hi śrāvakāyanam / jātyandhā iva me śrāvakāḥ pratibhānti satvendriyavimātratājñāne /
S04n550:472: $23 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma / yathā te bhikṣavo 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvenivāsam anusmaranti sma / te pañcabuddhaśataparyupāstikuśalamūlāḥ samyaksaṃbodhaye,
S04n550:473: teṣāṃ tad bodhicittam āmukhībhūtam / te tasya satpuruṣasya pādau śirobhiḥ praṇamya tatraiva niṣaṇṇāḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā,
S04n550:474: teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yathāvaivartikāḥ saṃvṛttā anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04n550:475: $24 tad nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:477: $25 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ kātyāyanam āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:478: gaccha tvaṃ kātyāyana vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:480: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:481: bhagavatā samkṣiptena bhikṣūṇām avavādo dattaḥ / teṣāṃ sūtrapadaviniścayāya dharmaṃ deśāyāmi,
S04n550:482: yad idam anityārthaṃ duḥkhārtham anātmārthaṃ śāntārtham /
S04n550:483: tatra vimalakīrtir licchavir upasamkramya mām evam āha :
S04n550:484: $26 mā bhadantakātyāyana sapracārām utpādabhaṇgayuktāṃ dharmatāṃ nirdiśa / yo bhadantamahākātyāyana atyantatayā na jāto na janiṣyati notpanno na niruddho na nirotsyate 'yam anityārthaḥ / yaḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ śūnyatānugamānutpādānirodhārtho 'yaṃ duḥkhārthaḥ / yad ātmānātmayor advayatvam ayam anātmārthaḥ / yo 'svabhāvo 'parabhāvas tad anujjvalitam,
S04n550:487: $27 asmin khalu punar nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni / tad nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:488: $28 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam aniruddham āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:489: gaccha tvam aniruddha vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:491: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ /
S04n550:493: anyatamasmiṃś caṇkrame caṇkramāmi / tatra śubhavyūho nāma brahmā daśabhir brahmasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ pradeśam avabhāsya yenāhaṃ tenopasamkramya mama pādau śirasābhivandyaikānte sthitvā mām etad avocat :
S04n550:494: kiyad āyuṣmān aniruddho divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati /
S04n550:496: ahaṃ mārṣa imaṃ triṃ sāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhagavataḥ śākyamuner buddhaksetraṃ tad yathāpi nāma karatale nyastam āmalakaphalam evaṃ paśyāmi /
S04n550:497: $30 iyaṃ ca kathā pravṛttā vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam upasamkrāmat / upasamkramya mama pādau śirasā vanditvaivam āha :
S04n550:498: kim bhadantāniruddha divyaṃ cakṣur abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam utānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam / yady abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇaṃ tad bāhyaiḥ pañcābhijñaiḥ samam,
S04n550:499: athānabhisaṃskāralakṣaṇam anabhisaṃskāro 'saṃskṛtas tena na śakyaṃ draṣṭum / tat kathaṃ sthaviraḥ paśyati /
S04n550:501: $31 sa ca brahmā tasya satpuruṣasyemaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptas taṃ namaskṛtyaitad avocat :
S04n550:503: āha : buddhā bhagavanto loke divyacakṣuṣo ye samāhitāvasthāṃ ca na vijahati sarvabuddhakṣetrāṇi ca paśyanti / na ca dvayaprabhāvitāḥ /
S04n550:504: $32 atha sa brahmemaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā daśasahasraparivāro 'dhyāśayenanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayati sma / sa māṃ vanditvā taṃ ca satpuruṣam abhivādya tatraivāntarhitaḥ / ahaṃ ca niṣpratibhāno 'bhūvam / tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:505: $33 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam upālim āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:506: gaccha tvam upāle vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛchakaḥ /
S04n550:508: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:510: tau bhagavataḥ paryapatrapamāṇau bhagavantaṃ nopasamkrāmataḥ / tau yenāhaṃ tenopasamkrāntāv upasamkrāmya mām ead avocatām / āvām bhadantopāle āpattim āpannau,
S04n550:511: tāv āvāṃ paryapatrapamāṇau bhagavantam upasamkramituṃ notsahāvahe / utsāhāya āyuṣmann upāle vinodayasvāyoḥ kaukṛtyaṃ vyutthāpayasvāvām āpatteḥ /
S04n550:512: $34 so 'haṃ bhagavaṃs tau bhikṣū dharmyayā kathayā samdarśayāmi / vimalakīrtiś ca licchavis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ sa mām etad avocat :
S04n550:515: mā āvilīkārṣīḥ / na hi bhadantopāle āpattir adhyātmapratiṣṭhitā na bahirdhāsamkrāntā nobhayam anatareṇopalabhyate / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / uktaṃ hi bhagavatā “cittasamkleśāt satvāḥ samkliśyante cittavyavadānād viśudhyante / cittaṃ ca bhadantopāle nādhyātmapratiṣṭhitaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate / yathā cittaṃ tathāpattiḥ,
S04n550:517: tathatāṃ na vyativartante / yā bhadantopāle cittasya prakṛtir yayā cittaprakṛtyā bhadantasya cittaṃ vimuktam,
S04n550:524: nairātmyā ca prakṛtiḥ / utpannabhagnānavasthitā bhadantopāle sarvadharmā māyāmeghavidyutsadṛśāḥ / nirapekṣāḥ sarvadharmāḥ kṣaṇam api nāvatiṣṭhante / svapnamarīcisadṛśāḥ sarvadharmā vitathadarśanāḥ / dakacandrapratibimbasadṛśāḥ sarvadharmāś cittaparikalpenotpadyante / ye tv evaṃ jānanti te vinayadharā ity ucyante / ya evaṃ vinītās te suvinītāḥ /
S04n550:526: prajñādharo vinayadharo 'yam upāsakaḥ / na tv ayaṃ bhadantopālir yo bhagavatā vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S04n550:528: mā bhikṣū atra gṛhapatisamjñām utpādayatām / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kaścic chrāvako vā bodhisatvo vā,
S04n550:529: ya etasya pratibhānam ācchindyāt / tādṛśa etasya prajñālokaḥ /
S04n550:530: $37 atha tau bhikṣū vinītakaukṛtyāv adhyāśayena tatraivānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpāditavantau,
S04n550:532: sarvasatvā īdṛśasya pratibhānasya lābhino bhavantu / tan nāham utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:533: $38 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ rāhulam āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:534: gaccha tvaṃ rāhula vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:536: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:537: ekasmin samaye saṃbahulā licchavikumārakā yenāhaṃ tenopasamkramya mām etad avocan :
S04n550:538: tvaṃ rāhula tasya bhagavataḥ putraś cakravartirājyam utsṛjya pravrajitaḥ,
S04n550:540: teṣām ahaṃ yathārūpaṃ pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsā nirdiśāmi,
S04n550:541: vimalakīrtir licchavir yenāhaṃ tenopasamkrāntaḥ / sa mām abhivandyaitad avocat :
S04n550:542: $39 na bhadantarāhula evaṃ pravrajyāyā guṇānuśaṃsā nirdeṣṭavyā yathā tvaṃ nirdiśasi / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / nirguṇā niranuśaṃsā hi pravrajyā / yatra bhadantarāhula saṃskṛtapravṛttis tatra guṇānuśaṃsā / pravrajyā cāsaṃskṛtā,
S04n550:543: asaṃskṛte ca na guṇā nānuśāṃsā / pravrajyā bhadantarāhula arūpiṇī rūpavigatā,
S04n550:564: sarvato 'navadyā / iyam ucyate pravrajyā / ya evaṃ pravrajitās te supravrajitāḥ /
S04n550:565: $40 pravrajata yūyaṃ kumārakāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye / durlabho hi buddhotpādaḥ,
S04n550:571: sa tān āha : utpādayata yūyaṃ kumārakāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam,
S04n550:574: $41 tatra dvātriṃśatā licchavikumārair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni / tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:575: $42 tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:576: gaccha tvam ānanda vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:577: ānada āha : nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:578: ekasmin samaye bhagavataḥ kāyasya kaścid evābādhaḥ / tatra ca kṣīreṇa kṛtyam āsīt / so 'ham anyatamasmin brāhmaṇamahāśālasya gṛhamūle pātraṃ gṛhītvā sthitaḥ /
S04n550:579: vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ / sa māṃ vanditvaivam āha :
S04n550:580: $43 kiṃ bhadantānanda kālyam eva pātram ādāyāsmin gṛhadvārasamīpe tiṣṭhasi /
S04n550:582: bhagavato gṛhapate kāyasya kaścid evābādhaḥ / tatra ca kṣīreṇa kṛtyam,
S04n550:585: alaṃ bhadantānanda mā evaṃ vocaḥ / vajrasaṃhatano hi bhadantānanda tathāgatakāyaḥ sarvākuśalavāsanāprahīṇaḥ sarvamahaujaskakuśaladharmasamanvāgataḥ / kutas tasya vyādhiḥ kuta upadravaḥ /
S04n550:586: $44 tūṣṇīṃbhūto bhadantānanda gaccha / mā bhagavantam abhyācakṣva / mā kasyacid bhūya evaṃ vocaḥ / mā mahaujaskā devaputrā anyabuddhakṣetrasamnipatitāś ca bodhisatvāḥ śroṣyanti / rājñas tāvad bhadantānanda cakravartina itvarakuśalasamanvāgatasya vyādhir na saṃvidyate / kutas tasya bhagavato 'pramaṇākuśalasamanvāgatasya vyādhir bhaviṣyati / nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate / gaccha gaccha bhadantānanda / mā mām adhyapatrāpaya,
S04n550:588: mā teṣām evaṃ bhaviṣyati / kīdṛśo bata ayam eṣāṃ śāstā yaḥ svayam eva tāvad ātmānaṃ glānaṃ na śaknoti paritrātum,
S04n550:589: kutaḥ punar glānānāṃ satvānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati / tataḥ pracchannaṃ bhadantānanda gaccha śīghram / mā kaścic chṛṇuyāt /
S04n550:590: $45 api tu bhadantānanda dharmakāyās tathāgatā nāmiṣakāyāḥ / lokottarakāyās tathāgatāḥ sarvalokadharmasamatikrāntāḥ / anābādhas tathāgatasya kāyas sarvāsravavinivṛtaḥ / asaṃskṛtas tathāgatasya kāyaḥ sarvasamkhyāvigataḥ / tasya bhadanto vyādhim icchatīty ayuktam asadṛśam /
S04n550:591: $46 tasya me bhagavan mahadapatrāpyaṃ jātam / mā me bhagavato 'ntikād duḥśrutaṃ durgṛhītaṃ vā kṛtam iti / so 'ham antarīkṣāc chabdam aśrauṣam /
S04n550:592: evam etad ānanda yathā gṛhapatir nirdiśati / atha ca punaḥ pañcakaṣāye bhagavān utpannaḥ,
S04n550:593: tenānarthalūhadaridracaryayā satvā vinetavyāḥ / tad gaccha tvam ānanda kṣīraṃ gṛhītvā,
S04n550:595: $47 īdṛśā bhagavan vimalakīrter licchaveḥ praśnavyākaraṇanirdeśāḥ / tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya kulaputrasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:596: $48 evaṃ tāni pañcamātrāṇi śrāvakaśatāny anutsahamānāni bhagavate nivedayanti / ye ca tair vimalakīrtinā licchavinā sārdhaṃ kathāsaṃlāpāḥ kṛtās tān sarvān bhagavate nivedayanti sma /
S04n550:597: $49 tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:598: gaccha tvaṃ maitreya vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:600: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:601: ekasmin samaye samtuṣitena devaputreṇa sārdhaṃ tuṣitakāyikaiś ca devaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayāmi yad idaṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām avivartyāṃ bhūmim ārabhya / tatra ca vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ pradeśam upasamkrāntaḥ / sa mām etad avocata :
S04n550:602: $50 tvaṃ maitreya ekajātipratibaddho bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau / tat katamayāsi maitreya jātyā vyākṛtaḥ,
S04n550:603: kim atītayā vānāgatayota pratyutpannayā / tatra yatītā jātiḥ sā kṣīṇā,
S04n550:605: pratyutpannāyāḥ sthitir nāsti jāteḥ / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā :
S04n550:606: tathā hi tvaṃ bhikṣaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe jāyase jīryasi mriyase cyavase upapadyase ceti / ajātitaś ca niyāmāvakrāntiḥ / na cājātir vyākriyate / nāpy ajātir abhisaṃbudhyate /
S04n550:607: $51 tat kathaṃ tvaṃ maitreya vyākṛtas tathatotpādena tathatānirodhena vā / na ca tathatotpadyate na nirudhyate,
S04n550:608: na nirotsyate / yā ca sarvasatvānāṃ tathatā,
S04n550:610: saiva maitreyasyāpi tathatā / evaṃ yadi tvaṃ vyākṛtaḥ sarvasatvā api vyākṛtā bhavanti / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / na hi tathatā dvayaprabhāvitā nānātvaprabhāvitā / tad yadā maitreyo bodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S04n550:611: sarvasatvā api tasmin samaye tādṛśīm eva bodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / sarvasatvānubodho ho bodhiḥ / yadā ca maitreyaḥ parinirvāsyati,
S04n550:612: sarvasatvā api tadā parinirvāsyanti / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / na hy aparinirvṛtānāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ tathāgatāḥ parinirvānti / parinirvṛtāni te satvāni paśyanti nirvāṇaprakṛtikāni / tasmād iha maitreya mā etān devaputrān ullāpaya mā visaṃvādaya /
S04n550:614: na nivartate / api tu khalu punar maitreya yaiṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ bodhiparikalpanadṛṣṭis tām etām utsarjaya /
S04n550:633: na deśasthā na pradeśasthā bodhiḥ sthānāsthānavigatā,
S04n550:635: nāmadheyamātraṃ bodhis tac ca nāma nirīhakam,
S04n550:643: sarvatrānugatā bodhir ākāśasvabhāvatvāt / sā na śakyā kāyena vācā cittenābhisaṃboddhum /
S04n550:644: $53 iha bhagavan nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne tataḥ pariṣado dvayor devaputraśatayor anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt / ahaṃ ca niṣpratibhāno 'bhūvam / tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:645: $54 tatra bhagavān prabhāvyūhaṃ licchavikumāram āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:646: gaccha tvaṃ satpuruṣa vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:648: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:649: ekasmin samaye bhagavan vaiśālyā mahānagaryā niṣkramāmi / vimalakīrtiś ca licchaviḥ praviśati / so 'haṃ tam abhivādyaivam avocam :
S04n550:688: $60 iti hi kulaputra yāvanto bodhisatvāḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ satvaparipākapratisaṃyuktaṃ saddharmaparigrahapratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalamūlapratisaṃyuktaṃ kramam utkṣipanti nikṣipanti ca / sarve te bodhimaṇḍād āgacchanti,
S04n550:691: $61 iha bhagavan nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcamātrair devamanuṣyaśatair bodhāya cittāny utpāditāni / ahaṃ ca niṣpratibhāno 'bhūvam / tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:692: $62 tatra bhagavān jagatindharaṃ bodhisatvam āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:693: gaccha tvaṃ jagatindhara vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:695: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:696: ekasmin samaye svake vihāre viharāmi / atha māraḥ pāpīyān dvādaśabhir apsaraḥsahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ śakraveṣeṇa tūryasamgītisaṃpravāditena yenāhaṃ tenopasamkramya mama pādau śirasā vanditvā saparivāro māṃ puraskṛtyaikānte 'sthāt / tam enam ahaṃ jānāmi - śakra eṣa devendra iti /
S04n550:702: pratīccha tvaṃ satpuruṣa imāni dvādaśāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi mamāntikāt,
S04n550:705: mā tvaṃ kauṣika akalpikena vastunā śramaṇān śākyaputrīyān nimantraya,
S04n550:706: yathā na hy etā asmākaṃ kalpyanta iti /
S04n550:708: vimalakīrtir licchavir upasamkrāntaḥ / sa mām evam āha :
S04n550:709: mā atra kulaputra śakrasamjñām utpādaya / māra eṣa pāpīyāṃs tava viheṭhanābhiprāya upasamkrāntaḥ,
S04n550:711: atha vimalakīrtir licchavis taṃ māraṃ pāpīyāṃsam etad avocat :
S04n550:712: asmabhyaṃ pāpīyan etā apsaraso niryātaya / asmākam etāḥ kalpyante,
S04n550:714: atha māraḥ pāpīyān bhītas trastaḥ saṃvignaḥ / mā vimalakīrtinā licchavinā vipralapsya iti,
S04n550:716: na ca śaknoti sarvarddhim api darśayitvāntardhātum / so 'ntarīkṣāc chabdam aśrauṣit :
S04n550:717: niryātaya tvam etāḥ pāpīyan apsarasa etasmai satpuruṣāya,
S04n550:718: tataḥ śakṣyasi svabhavanaṃ gantum / atha māro bhītas trasto 'kāmako 'smai tā apsaraso niryātayati /
S04n550:719: $64 pratigṛhya ca vimalakīrtis tā apsarasa etad avocat :
S04n550:721: utpādayatedānīm anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam / sa tāsāṃ tadānulomikīṃ bodhiparipācanīṃ kathāṃ kṛtvā bodhau cittam utpādayati sma /
S04n550:726: tā āhuḥ : katamā ca punar dharmārāmaratiḥ /
S04n550:760: apramādabodhipakṣyadharmasevanāratiḥ / evaṃ hi bodhisatvo dharmārāmaratirato bhavati /
S04n550:761: $65 atha māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tā apsarasa etad avocat :
S04n550:764: niryātitā idānīṃ tvayā vayam asmai gṛhapataye / dharmārāmaratiratābhir asmābhir idānīṃ bhavitavyam,
S04n550:766: atha māraḥ pāpīyān vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim evam āha :
S04n550:767: niḥsṛja tvaṃ gṛhapate imā apsarasaḥ / sarvasvaparityāgino bodhisatvā mahāsatvā bhavanti /
S04n550:769: avasṛṣṭā bhavantu / gaccha pāpīyan / sarvasatvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūryantām /
S04n550:770: atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrtiṃ namaskṛtyaivam āhuḥ :
S04n550:772: $66 āha : asti bhaginyaḥ akṣayapradīpaṃ nāma dharmamukham / tatra pratipadyadhvam / tat punaḥ katamat / tadyathā bhaginyaḥ ekasmāt tailapradīpād dīpaśatasahasrāṇy ādīpyante / na ca tasya dīpasya parihāṇir bhavati / evam eva bhaginyaḥ eko bodhisatvo bahūni sarvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati / na ca tasya bodhisatvasya cittasmṛtir hīyate,
S04n550:774: uta ca vardhate / evaṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmān yathā yathā pareṣām ārocayati deśayati,
S04n550:775: tathā tathā vivardhate sarvaiḥ kuśalair dharmaiḥ / idaṃ tad akṣayapradīpaṃ nāma dharmamukham / tatra yuṣmābhir mārabhavane sthitābhir aparimāṇānāṃ devaputrāṇām apsarasāṃ ca bodhicittaṃ rocayitavyam / evaṃ yūyaṃ tathāgatasya kṛtajñā bhaviṣyatha / sarvasatvānāṃ copajīvyā bhaviṣyatha /
S04n550:776: $67 atha tā apsaraso vimalakīrter licchaveḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā sārdhaṃ māreṇa prakrāntāḥ / ime bhagavan vimalakīrter licchaver vikurvaṇaviśeṣāḥ,
S04n550:777: yān ahaṃ nājñāsiṣam / tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:778: $68 tatra bhagavān sudattaṃ śreṣṭhiputram āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:779: gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:781: nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / abhijānāmy ahaṃ bhagavan :
S04n550:782: svake paitṛke niveśane mahāyajñaṃ yajāmi / sarvadaridraduḥkhitebhyaḥ sarvaśramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīyakayācanakebhyo dānaṃ dadāmi / saptadivasān mahāyajñaṃ yajāmi /
S04n550:783: tatra saptame divase vimalakīrtir licchavis tāṃ mahāyajñaśālāṃ praviśya mām etad avocat :
S04n550:784: na śreṣṭhiputra evaṃ yajño yaṣṭavyo yathā tvaṃ yajase / dharmayajñas te yaṣṭavyaḥ / kiṃ ta āmiṣayajñena/
S04n550:789: ayaṃ dharmayajñaḥ / sa punaḥ katamaḥ / yad idaṃ bodhyākārābhinirhṛtā mahāmaitrī,
S04n550:822: yatra dharmayajñe pratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā iṣṭayajñayājūkā dakṣiṇīyā bhavanti sadevakasya lokasya / evaṃ hi bhagavan tasya gṛhapater nirdiśatas tasyā brāhmaṇaparṣado dvayor brāhmaṇaśatayor anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
S04n550:823: $75 ahaṃ cāścaryaprasādapratilabdhas tasya satpuruṣasya caraṇau praṇamya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ kaṇṭhād avatārya dadāmi / sa taṃ muktāhāraṃ na pratigṛhṇāti sma / tam aham etad avocam :
S04n550:825: yatra te prasādo bhavati tasmai prayaccheti /
S04n550:826: tena sa muktāhāro gṛhitvā dvidhākṛtaḥ / eko bhāgo yas tatra yajñaśālāyāṃ sarvalokajugupsito nagaradaridras tasmai dattaḥ / dvitīyaś ca bhāgo duṣprasahāya tathāgatāya dattaḥ / yathā ca sarvā parṣat paśyati taṃ ca marīciṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ ca duṣprasahaṃ tathāgataṃ taṃ ca muktāhāraṃ duṣprasahasya mūrdhasamdhau muktāhārakūṭāgāraṃ prādurbhūtaṃ citraṃ darśanīyaṃ caturasraṃ catuḥsthūṇaṃ samaṃbhāgaśaḥ suvibhaktam /
S04n550:827: $76 sa idaṃ prātihāryaṃ samdarśyemāṃ vācam abhāṣata :
S04n550:828: yasya dāyakasya dānapater yādṛśī tathāgate dakṣiṇīyasamjñā tādṛśī nagaradaridre nirnānātvena samā,
S04n550:829: mahākaruṇācittena vipākāpratikāṇkṣaṇatayā parityāgaḥ / iyaṃ dharmayajñāsya paripūriḥ /
S04n550:832: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayati sma / tan nāhaṃ bhagavan utsahe tasya satpuruṣasya glānaparipṛcchako gantum /
S04n550:833: $78 iti hi sarve te bodhisatvā mahāsatvāḥ svakasvakān nirdeśān nirdiśanti sma,
S04n550:834: ye caiṣāṃ tena satpuruṣeṇa sārdham antarākathāsamudāhārā abhūvan,
S04n550:838: $1 tatra bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:839: gaccha tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ vimalakīrter licchaver glānaparipṛcchakaḥ /
S04n550:841: kiṃ cāpi durāsado 'sau bhagavan vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ gambhīranayapratibhānapraviṣṭaḥ,
S04n550:851: upāyakauśalyagatimgataḥ prāptapraśnaviniścayaḥ / sa na śakyo 'lpakena samnāhenābhirādhayitum / atha ca punar gamiṣyāmi buddhādhiṣṭhānena,
S04n550:853: $2 atha tataḥ parṣadas teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca śakrabrahmalokapālānāṃ teṣāṃ ca devaputrāṇām etad abhavat :
S04n550:855: yatra mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sa ca satpuruṣa ubhau saṃlapiṣyataḥ / tatrāṣṭau ca bodhisatvasahasrāṇi pañcamātrāṇi ca śrāvakaśatāni saṃbahulāś ca śakrabrahmalokapālāḥ saṃbahulāni ca devaputraśatasahasrāṇi mañjuśriyam anubaddhāni dharmaśravaṇāya / atha mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtas tair bodhisatvair mahāsatvais taiś ca śrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca parivṛto vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviśati sma /
S04n550:857: ayaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āgacchati mahatā parivāreṇa / yan nv ahaṃ śūnyaṃ gṛham adhitiṣṭheyam / tena taṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyam adhiṣṭhitam apagatadvārapālam / na tatra mañcā vā pīṭhā vāsanāni vā samdṛśyante 'nyatraikasmān mañcāt,
S04n550:859: $4 atha mañjuśrīḥ saparivāro yena vimalakīrter niveśanaṃ tenopasamkrāmat / upasamkramya praviśati sma / sa taṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyam apaśyad vigatadvārapālam / na cātra mañcān vā pīṭhān vāpaśyad anyatraikamañcāt,
S04n550:860: yatra vimalakīrtiḥ śayitaḥ / atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam adrākṣīt / dṛṣṭvā ca punar evam āha :
S04n550:863: evam etad gṛhapate yathā vadasi / ya āgato na sa bhūya āgamiṣyati / yaś ca gato na sa bhūyo gamiṣyati / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / na cāgatasyāgamanaṃ prajñāyate,
S04n550:865: yaś ca dṛṣṭo na bhūyo draṣṭavyaḥ /
S04n550:866: $5 api tu kaccit te satpuruṣa kṣapaṇīyam,
S04n550:869: kaccid apagacchati vyādhir na vivardhate / bhagavāṃs te 'lpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchati,
S04n550:870: alpātaṇkatāṃ cālpaglānyatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
S04n550:871: $6 kutra te gṛhapate idaṃ vyādhisamutthānam / kiyacciram upādāya te vyādhiḥ / kadā copaśamiṣyati /
S04n550:873: yāvacciram upādāya mañjuśrīḥ avidyā bhavatṛṣṇā ca tāvacciram upādāya mamaiṣa vyādhiḥ / yadā ca sarvasatvā vigatavyādhayo bhaviṣyanti tadā mama vyādhiḥ praśrabdho bhaviṣyati / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / satvādhiṣṭhāno hi mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvasya saṃsāraḥ / saṃsāraniśritaś ca vyādhiḥ / yadā sarvasatvā vigatavyādhayo bhaviṣyanti tadā bodhisatvo 'rogo bhaviṣyati /
S04n550:874: $7tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ śreṣṭhina ekaputrako glāno bhavet / tasya mātāpitarāv api glānau syātām / tāvac ca duḥkhitau bhavetāṃ yāvan nāsāv ekaputrakas tayor vigatavyādhiḥ syāt / evaṃ mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvasya sarvasatveṣv ekaputrakaprema / sa satvaglānyena glāno bhavati,
S04n550:875: satvārogyāt tv arogaḥ / yat punar mañjuśrīḥ evaṃ vadasi - kutaḥ samutthito vyādhir iti,
S04n550:878: śūnyaṃ te gṛhapate gṛham / na ca te kaścid upasthāyakaḥ /
S04n550:885: āha : yenāpi parikalpyeta tad api śūnyam / na ca śūnyatā śūnyatāṃ parikalpayati /
S04n550:887: āha : śūnyatā mañjuśrīḥ dvāṣaṣṭibhyo dṝṣṭigatebhyo mārgitavyā /
S04n550:888: āha : dvāṣaṣṭiḥ punar dṛṣṭigatāni kuto mārgitavyāni /
S04n550:891: āha : sarvasatvacittacaritebhyo mārgitavyā / yat punar mañjuśrīḥ evaṃ vadasi kas ta upasthāyaka iti,
S04n550:892: sarvamārāḥ sarvaparapravādinaś ca mamopasthāyakāḥ / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / mārā hi saṃsārasya varṇavādinaḥ / saṃsāraś ca bodhisatvasyopasthāyakaḥ / parapravādino dṛṣṭigatānāṃ varṇavādinaḥ / bodhisatvaś ca sarvadṛṣṭigatebhyo na calati / tasmāt sarvamārāḥ sarvaparapravādinaś ca mamopasthāyakāḥ /
S04n550:896: āha : kim eṣa vyādhiḥ kāyasaṃprayukta uta cittasaṃprayuktaḥ /
S04n550:897: āha : na kāyasaṃprayuktaḥ kāyaviviktatayā / na cittasaṃprayukto māyādharmatayā cittasya /
S04n550:898: āha : catvāra ime gṛhapate dhātavaḥ / katame catvāraḥ,
S04n550:899: yad uta pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur iti / tat katamas tatra dhātur bādhate /
S04n550:900: āha : ya evaṃ dhātuko mañjuśrīḥ sarvasatvānāṃ vyādhis tenāhaṃ vyādhitaḥ /
S04n550:901: $10 api tu khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ bodhisatvena glānako bodhisatvaḥ pratisaṃmoditavyaḥ /
S04n550:915: vaidyarājo bhaviṣyasi sarvavyādhīnāṃ śamayiteti / evaṃ bodhisatvena bodhisatvo glānaḥ pratisaṃmoditavyaḥ /
S04n550:917: kathaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvena glānena svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam /
S04n550:919: iha mañjuśriḥ bodhisatvena glānenaivaṃ svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam / pūrvāntāsadviparyāsakarmasamutthānasamutthito 'yaṃ vyādhir abhūtaparikalpakleśasamutthitaḥ / na punar atra kaścit paramārthato dharma upalabhyate yasyaiṣa vyādhiḥ / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / cāturmahābhautiko 'yaṃ samucchrayaḥ / na caiṣāṃ dhātūnāṃ kaścit svāmī na samutthāpayitā / anātmā hy ayaṃ samucchrayaḥ / yo 'yaṃ vyādhir nāma nāyaṃ paramārthata upalabhyate,
S04n550:920: anyatrātmābhiniveśāt / uta nātmany abhiniviṣṭā vihariṣyāmo vyādhimūlaparijñātāvinaḥ / tenātmasamjñāṃ viṣṭhāpya dharmasamjñotpādayitavyā / dharmasamghāto 'yaṃ kāyaḥ / dharmā evotpadyamānā utpadyante / dharmā eva nirudhyāmānā nirudhyante / te ca dharmāḥ parasparaṃ na cetayanti na jānanti / na ca teṣām utpadyamānānām evaṃ bhavaty utpadyāmaha iti / na nirudhyamānānām evaṃ bhavati nirudhyāmaha iti /
S04n550:921: $12 tena dharmasamjñāyā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyam / yāpy eṣā dharmasamjñā so 'pi viparyāsaḥ / viparyāsaś ca mahāvyādhiḥ / vigatavyādhikena ca mayā bhavitavyam / vyādhiprahāṇāya ca yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ / tatra katamad vyādhiprahāṇam,
S04n550:922: yad idam ahamkāramamakāraprahāṇam / tac ca katamad ahamkāramamakāraprahāṇam,
S04n550:923: yad idaṃ dvayavigamaḥ / tatra katamo dvayavigamaḥ,
S04n550:924: yad idam adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā ca samudācāraḥ / tatra katamo 'dhyātmaṃ bahirdhā samudācāraḥ,
S04n550:925: yad uta samatayācalanatāpracalanatā / katamā ca samatā,
S04n550:926: ātmasamatayā ca nirvāṇasamatā / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / ubhe 'py ete śūnye,
S04n550:927: yad utātmā nirvāṇaṃ ca / kenaite śūnye,
S04n550:928: nāmodāhāreṇaite śūnye / ubhāv apy etāv apariniṣpannau,
S04n550:929: yad utātmā nirvāṇaṃ ca / tena samadarśinā nānyo vyādhir nānyā śūnyatā kartavyā / vyādhir eva śūnyatā /
S04n550:930: $13 aviditā ca sā vedanā veditavyā / na cānena vedanānirodhaḥ sākṣātkartavyaḥ / aparipūrṇeṣu buddhadharmeṣūbhe vedane notsraṣṭavye / na ca durgatyupapannānāṃ satvānām antike mahākaruṇā notpādayitavyā / tathā kariṣyāmo yathaiṣāṃ satvānām evam ayoniśonidhyaptyā vyādhim apaneṣyāmaḥ /
S04n550:931: $ 14 na caiṣāṃ kamcid dharmam upaneṣyāmo nāpaneṣyāmaḥ / yato nidānāc ca punar vyādhir utpadyate tasya parijñāyai tebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ / katamac ca punar nidānam,
S04n550:935: yad idam ālambanānupalambhaḥ / yaṃ hi nopalabhyate taṃ nālambate / kiṃ ca nopalabhate,
S04n550:937: yad idam ātmadṛṣṭiṃ paradṛṣṭiṃ ca / tad ucyate 'nupalambha iti / evaṃ hi mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvena svacittaṃ nidhyapayitavyaṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇopapattiprahāṇāya / evaṃ ca mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvānāṃ bodhir yadi na bhavet,
S04n550:938: nirarthako nanu vyāyāmo bhavet / yathā pratyarthikanirghātāc chūrā ity ucyante,
S04n550:939: evam eva jarāvyādhimaraṇaduḥkhopaśamanād bodhisatvā ity ucyante /
S04n550:940: $15 tena bodhisatvena vyādhitenaivaṃ pratyavekṣitavyam / yathā mama vyādhir abhūto 'sann evaṃ sarvasatvānām api vyādhir abhūto 'sann iti / tasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇasya nānuśaṃsādṛṣṭipatitā satveṣu mahākaruṇotpadyate,
S04n550:941: anyatrāgantukakleśaprahāṇābhiyuktā satveṣu mahākaruṇotpadyate / tat kasmad dhetoḥ / anuśaṃsadṛṣṭipatitayaiva hi mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvasya khedo bhavaty upapattiṣu / anuśaṃsadṛṣṭiparyutthānavigatayā punar mahākaruṇayā bodhisatvaysa khedo na bhavaty upapattiṣu / so 'yam upapadyate,
S04n550:942: na ca dṛṣṭiparyutthānāparyutthita upapadyate / so 'paryutthitacitta upapadyamāno mukta evotpadyate mukta eva jāyate / sa mukta evotpadyamāno mukta eva jāyamāno baddhānāṃ satvānāṃ śaktaḥ pratibalo bandhamokṣāya dharmaṃ deśayitum / yathoktaṃ bhagavatā “ sa tāvad ātmanā baddhaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayṣyatīti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate / yas tv ātmanā muktaḥ paraṃ bandhanān mocayiṣyatīti sthānam etad vidyate“ / tasmān muktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam,
S04n550:945: katamo mokṣaḥ / anupāyād bhavagatiparigraho bodhisatvasya bandhaḥ,
S04n550:946: upāyād bhavagatigamanaṃ mokṣaḥ / anupāyād dhyānasamādhyāsvādanatā bodhisatvasya bandhaḥ,
S04n550:947: upāyena dhyānasamādhyāsvādanatā mokṣaḥ / anupāyasamgṛhītā prajñā bandhaḥ,
S04n550:948: upāyasamgṛhītā prajñā mokṣaḥ / prajñāyāsamgṛhītā upāyo bandhanam,
S04n550:952: na ca lakṣaṇānuvyañjanabuddhakṣetrālamkārasatvaparipācananidhyaptiḥ / iyam anupāyasamgṛhītā prajñā bandhaḥ / tatra katamopāyasamgṛhītā prajñā mokṣaḥ,
S04n550:953: yad idaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanabuddhakṣetrālamkārasatvaparipācananidhyapticittaṃ ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaparijayaś ca / iyam upāyasamgṛhītā prajñā mokṣaḥ / tatra katamaḥ prajñayāsamgṛhītā upāyo bandhaḥ,
S04n550:954: yad idaṃ sarvadṛṣṭikleśaparyutthānānuśayānunayapratighapratiṣṭhitasya sarvakuśalamūlārambho bodhau cāpariṇāmanā / ayaṃ prajñayāsamgṛhīta upāyo bandhaḥ / tatra katamaḥ prajñā samgṛhīta upāyo mokṣaḥ,
S04n550:955: yad idaṃ sarvadṛṣṭikleśaparyutthānānuśayānunayapratighaprahīṇasya sarvakuśalamūlārambho bodhau pariṇāmitas tasya cāparāmarśaḥ / ayaṃ bodhisatvasya prajñāsamgṛhīta upāyo mokṣaḥ /
S04n550:956: $18 tatra mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvenaivam ime dharmā nidhyapayitavyāḥ / yat kāyasya cittasya ca vyādheś cānityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmapratyavekṣaṇā,
S04n550:957: iyam asya prajñā / yat punaḥ kāyavyādhipariharaṇatayā na khidyate,
S04n550:960: ayam asyopāyaḥ / punar aparaṃ yat kāyasya vyādheś cittasya cānyonyaparāparatāṃ na nirnavatāniḥpurāṇatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
S04n550:961: iyam asya prajñā / yat punaḥ kāyasya vyādheś cittasya ca nātyantopaśamaṃ nirodham atyayati,
S04n550:963: $19 evaṃ hi mañjuśrīḥ glānena bodhisatvena cittaṃ nidhyapayitavyam / na ca tena nidhyaptau vānidhyaptau vā sthātavyam / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / yadi hy anidhyaptau tiṣṭḥed bāladharma eṣaḥ / atha nidhyaptau tiṣṭhec chrāvakadharma eṣaḥ / tasmād bodhisatvena na nidhyaptau sthātavyam / yad atrāsthānam ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ /
S04n550:965: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat saṃsāragocaraś ca na ca kleśagocaraḥ,
S04n550:966: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yan nirvāṇapratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca na cātyantaparinirvāṇagocaraḥ,
S04n550:967: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yac caturmārasamdarśanagocaraś ca sarvamāraviṣayātikrāntagocaraś ca,
S04n550:968: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat sarvajñajñānaparyeṣṭigocaraś ca na cākāle jñānaprāptigocaraḥ,
S04n550:969: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yac catuḥsatyajñānagocaraś ca na cākāle satyaprativedhagocaraḥ,
S04n550:970: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad adhyātmapratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca samcintyabhavopapattiparigrahagocaraś ca,
S04n550:971: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad ajātipratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca na ca niyāmāvakrāntigocaraḥ,
S04n550:972: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat pratītyasamutpādagocaraś ca sarvadṛṣṭivigatagocaraś ca,
S04n550:973: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat sarvasatvasamgaṇikāgocaraś ca na ca kleśānuśayagocaraḥ,
S04n550:974: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad vivekagocaraś ca na ca kleśānuśayagocaraḥ,
S04n550:975: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad vivekagocaraś ca na ca kāyacittakṣayaniśrayagocaraḥ,
S04n550:976: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat traidhātukagocaraś ca na ca dharmadhātusaṃbhedagocaraḥ,
S04n550:977: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yac chūnyatāgocaraś ca sarvākāraguṇaparyeṣṭigocaraś ca,
S04n550:978: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad ānimittagocaraś ca satvapramocanārambaṇavitarkagocaraś ca,
S04n550:979: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad apraṇihitagocaraś ca samcintyabhavagatisamdarśanagocaraś ca,
S04n550:980: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad anabhisaṃskāragocaraś ca sarvakuśalamūlābhisaṃskarapratiprasrabdhigocaraś ca,
S04n550:981: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat ṣaṭpāramitāgocaraś ca sarvasatvacittacaritapāragamanagocaraś ca,
S04n550:982: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat ṣaḍanusmṛtigocaraś ca na ca sarvāsravakṣayagocaraḥ,
S04n550:983: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat saddharmapratiṣṭhānagocaraś ca na ca kumārgādhyālambanagocaraḥ,
S04n550:984: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat ṣaḍabhijñāgocaraś na ca cāsravakṣayagocaraḥ,
S04n550:985: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yac caturpramāṇagocaraś ca na ca brahmalokopapattisparśanagocaraḥ,
S04n550:986: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad dhyānasamādhisamāpattigocaraś ca na ca samādhisamāpattivaśenopapattigocaraḥ,
S04n550:987: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat smṛtyupasthānagocaraś ca na ca kāyavedanācittadharmātyarthagocaraḥ,
S04n550:988: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat samyakprahaṇāgocaraś ca na ca kuśalākuśaladvayopalambhagocaraḥ,
S04n550:989: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad ṛddhipādābhinirhāragocaraś cānābhogarddhipādavaśavartigocaraś ca,
S04n550:990: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat pañcendriyagocaraś ca sarvasatvendriyaparāparajñānagocaraś ca,
S04n550:991: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat pañcabalapratiṣṭhānagocaraś ca daśatathāgatabalābhisamdarśanagocaraś ca,
S04n550:992: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yat saptabodhyaṇgapariniṣpattigocaraś ca buddhiprabhedajñānakauśalyagocaraś ca,
S04n550:993: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yan mārgapratiṣṭhānagocaraś ca kumārgānadhyālambanagocaraś ca,
S04n550:994: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yac chamathavidarśanāsaṃbhāraparyeṣṭigocaraś ca na cātyantaśāntipatanagocaraḥ,
S04n550:996: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yac chrāvakapratyekabuddhākalpasamdarśanagocaraś ca buddhadharmātyajanagocaraś ca,
S04n550:997: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad atyantaviśuddhiprakṛtisamāpannasarvadharmānugamanagocaraś ca yathādhimuktisarvasatveryāpathasamdarśanagocaraś ca,
S04n550:998: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad atyantāsaṃvartavivartākāśasvabhāvasarvabuddhakṣetrapratyavekṣaṇagocaraś ca nānāvyuhānekavyūhabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhasamdarśanagocaraś ca,
S04n550:999: ayaṃ bodhisatvasya gocaraḥ / yad dharmacakrapravartanamahāparinirvāṇasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca bodhisatvacaryātyajanagovaraś ca,
S04n550:1001: iha nirdeśe nirdiśyamāne ye mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena sārdham āgatā devaputrās tato 'ṣṭānāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇām anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni //
S04n550:1006: ime ca mahāśrāvakāḥ / neha gṛha āsanāni saṃvidyante /
S04n550:1007: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetovitarkam ājñāyāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram etad avocat :
S04n550:1010: $2 āha : tena hi bhadantaśāriputra yo dharmārthiko bhavati,
S04n550:1011: nāsau svakāyārthiko bhavati / kiṃ punar āsanārthiko bhaviṣyati / yo bhadantaśāriputra dharmārthiko bhavati,
S04n550:1018: nāsau duḥkhaparijñānārthiko na samudayaprahāṇārthiko na nirodhasākṣātkriyārthiko na mārgabhāvanārthiko bhavati / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / aprapañco hi dharmo nirakṣaraḥ / tatra yaḥ prapañcayati - duḥkhaṃ parijñāsyāmi samudayaṃ prahāsyāmi nirodhaṃ sākṣātkariṣyāmi mārgaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmīti,
S04n550:1020: prapañcārthiko 'sau / dharmo hi bhadantaśāriputra upaśāntaḥ / tatra ya utpādavyaye caranti,
S04n550:1022: utpādavyayārthikās te / dharmo hy arajo rajo'pagataḥ / tatra ye kvacid dharme rakṣante 'ntaśo nirvāṇe 'pi,
S04n550:1024: rajo'rthikās te / dharmo hy aviṣayaḥ / ye viṣayasamkhyātāḥ,
S04n550:1026: viṣayārthikās te / dharmo nāyūho niryūhaḥ / ye kecid dharmaṃ gṛhṇanti vā muñcanti vā,
S04n550:1031: ālayārthikās te / dharmo nirnimittaḥ / yeṣāṃ nimittānusārivijñānam,
S04n550:1033: nimittārthikās te / dharmo 'saṃvāsaḥ / ye kecid dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃvasanti,
S04n550:1035: saṃvāsārthikās te / dharmo 'dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaḥ / ye dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣu caranti,
S04n550:1038: $5 dharmo bhadantaśāriputra asaṃskṛtaḥ saṃskṛtāpagataḥ / ye saṃskṛtagocarāḥ,
S04n550:1040: saṃskṛtodgrahaṇārthikās te / tasmād iha bhadantaśāriputra dharmārthikena te bhavitukāmena sarvadharmānarthikena bhavitavyam / iha dharmanirdeśe nirdiśyamāne pañcānāṃ devaputraśatānāṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur viśuddham /
S04n550:1041: $6 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:1042: tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ daśasu dikṣv asamkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetraśatasahasreṣu buddhakṣetracārikāṃ carasi / tat katarasmin buddhakṣetre tvayā sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvaguṇopetāni siṃhāsanāni dṛāṣṭāni / evam ukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat :
S04n550:1043: asti kulaputra pūrve digbhāge ṣaṭtriṃśadgaṇgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya merudhvajā nāma lokadhātuḥ / tatra merupradīparājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati / tasya tathāgatasya caturaśītiyojanaśatasahasra ātmabhāvaḥ / aṣṭaṣaṣṭiyojanaśatasahasraṃ tasya bhagavataḥ siṃhāsanam / teṣāṃ ca bodhisatvānāṃ catvāriṃśadyojanaśatasahasra ātmabhāvaḥ / catustriṃśadyojanaśatasahāsrāṇi teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ siṃhāsanāni / merudhvajāyāṃ lokadhātau tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre sarvaviśiṣṭāni sarvaguṇopetāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04n550:1044: $7 atha vimalakīrtir licchavis tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ samanvāhāraṃ samanvāharati sma / tādṛśaṃ cārddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān,
S04n550:1045: yat tato merudhvajālokadhātor dvātriṃśatsiṃhāsanaśatasahasrāṇi tena bhagavatā merupadīparājena tathāgatena preṣitāni / tāvad udviddhāni tāvad vistīrṇāni tāvad darśanīyāni yad apūrvāṇi tair bodhisatvais taiś ca mahāśrāvakais taiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālair devaputraiś ca / tāny upary antarīkṣeṇāgatya vimalakīrter licchaver niveśane pratyatiṣṭhan / tac ca gṛhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ samdṛṣyate,
S04n550:1046: yatra tāni dvātriṃśatasiṃhāsanaśatasahasrāṇi vicitrāny anutpīḍanatayā / na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam,
S04n550:1048: na cāturdvīpikasyāvaraṇam / sarve te tathaiva samdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
S04n550:1049: $8 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam etad avocat :
S04n550:1050: niṣīda tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ siṃhāsane sārdham etair bodhisatvaiḥ / tādṛśāṃś cātmabhāvān adhitiṣṭhata yat siṃhāsaneṣv anurūpāḥ syuḥ /
S04n550:1051: atha ye 'bhijñāpratilabdhā bodhisatvās te dvācatvāriṃśadyojanaśatasahasram ātmabhāvam adhiṣṭhāya teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu niṣīdanti sma / ye cādikarmikā bodhisatvās te na śaknuvanti sma teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu niṣattum /
S04n550:1052: atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram āmantrayate sma :
S04n550:1054: āha : na śaknomi satpuruṣa niṣattum uccāni pragṛhītāni cemāni siṃhāsanāni /
S04n550:1055: āha : tena hi bhadantaśāriputra tasyaiva bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kuru / tataḥ śakṣyasi niṣattum /
S04n550:1056: atha te mahāśrāvakās tasya bhagavato merupradīparājasya tathāgatasya namaskāraṃ kurvanti sma / te tatra paścāt teṣu siṃhāsaneṣu nyaṣīdan /
S04n550:1057: $9 athāyuṣmāñ śāriputro vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim evam āha :
S04n550:1058: āścaryaṃ kulaputra yad ihaivaṃ parītte gṛha imānīyanti siṃhāsanasahasrāṇy evam uccāny evaṃ pragṛhītāni vicitrāni / na ca vaiśālyā mahānagaryā āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam,
S04n550:1062: na devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇām āvaraṇaṃ kṛtam / tathaiva samdṛśyante yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt /
S04n550:1064: asti bhadantaśāriputra tathāgatānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ cācintyo nāma vimokṣaḥ,
S04n550:1065: yatracintyavimokṣe pratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājam tāvad uccaṃ tāvat pragṛhītaṃ tāvad udviddhaṃ tāvad vistīrṇaṃ sarṣapaphalakośe praveśayet / na ca sarṣapaphalakośaṃ vivardhayet / na ca sumeruṃ hāpayet / tāṃ ca kriyām ādarśayet / na cāturmahārājakāyikā devās trayastriṃśato vā jānīran - kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ / anye ca satvā ṛddhivineyā jānīyūḥ paśyeyus taṃ sumeruṃ parvatarājaṃ sarśapaphalakośapraviṣtam / ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra bodhisatvānām acintyasya vimokṣasya visayapraveśaḥ /
S04n550:1066: $11 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo yaś caturṣu mahāsamudreṣv apskandhas tam ekasmin romakūpe prakṣipet / na ca matsyakacchapaśiśumāramaṇḍūkānām anyeṣāṃ vaudakānāṃ prāṇināṃ pīḍā bhavet / na ca nāgayakṣagandharvāsurāṇām evaṃ bhavet - kasmin vayaṃ prakṣiptāḥ / sā na kriyā prajñāyeta / na ca kaścit satvo vihiṃsito viheṭhito vā bhavet /
S04n550:1067: $12 imaṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhārgavacakram iva parigṛhya dakṣiṇe pāṇāv avabhrāmya gaṇgānadīvālikāsamān lokadhātūn kṣipet / na ca satvā jānīran - kasmin vayaṃ nītāḥ,
S04n550:1068: kuto vāgatā iti / punar api cānāyya yathāsthānaṃ sthāpayet / na ca gamanāgamanaṃ samjānīram / sā ca kriyā samdṛśyeta /
S04n550:1069: $13 punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra santi satvā apramāṇasaṃsāravainayikāḥ / santi samkṣiptasaṃsāravainayikāḥ / tatrācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo 'pramānasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntam ādarśayet / samkṣiptasaṃsāravainayikānāṃ satvānāṃ vainayikavaśam upādāya kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntam ādarśayet / tatrāpramāṇasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ saptarātraṃ kalpam atikrāntaṃ samjānīran / samkṣiptasaṃsāravineyāḥ satvāḥ kalpaṃ saptarātram atikrāntaṃ samjānīran /
S04n550:1070: $14 iti hy acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhān ekasmin buddhakṣetre samdarśayati / sarvasatvān api dakṣiṇe karatale pratiṣṭhāpya cittajāvikayarddhyā kramet / sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu ca samdarśanaṃ dadyāt / na caikato 'pi kṣetrāc calet / yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā vartante,
S04n550:1071: tāḥ sarvā ekaromakūpa ādarśayet / yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu candrasūryās tārārūpāṇi ca,
S04n550:1072: tāny api sarvāṇy ekaromakūpa ādarśayet / yāvatyaś ca daśasu dikṣu vātamaṇḍalyaḥ pravānti,
S04n550:1073: tā api sarvā mukhadvāre praveśayet / na cāsya kāyo vikīryeta / na ca tatra buddhakṣetre tṛṇavanaspatayo nameyuḥ /
S04n550:1074: $15 yāni ca daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetrāṇy uddaḥyante kalpoddāhena,
S04n550:1075: tad api sarvam agniskandhaṃ svamukhe prakṣipet / yac ca tena karma kartavyam bhavet,
S04n550:1076: tac ca kuryāt / yac cāvastād gaṇgānadīvālikākoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣv atikramya buddhakṣetram,
S04n550:1077: tad abhyutkṣipyordhaṃ digdhāgaṃ gaṇgānadīvālikoṭīsameṣu buddhakṣetreṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet / tadyathāpi nāma balavān puruṣaḥ sūcyagreṇa badarīpatram utkṣipet /
S04n550:1078: $16 evam acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvāni cakravartyādirūpāṇy adhitiṣṭhet /
S04n550:1079: $17 yāvantaś ca daśasu dikṣu śabdāvabhāsāḥ śabdaprajñāptayaḥ,
S04n550:1080: tāḥ sarvā hīnamadhyaviśiṣṭānām satvānāṃ sarvabuddhaghoṣarutaracitāny adhitiṣṭhan,
S04n550:1081: tataś ca rutaghoṣād anityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmaśabdarutāni niścārayet / yāvadbhiś cākāranirdeśair daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04n550:1083: $18 ayaṃ bhadantaśāriputra acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ yatkimcinmātro viṣayāvatāranirdeśaḥ / api tu kalpam ahaṃ bhadantaśāriputra kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ viṣayānāṃ viṣayāvatāranirdeśaṃ nirdiśeyam,
S04n550:1085: $19 atha khalu sthaviro mahākāśyapa imaṃ bodhisatvānām acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvāścaryaprāptaḥ sthāviraṃ śāriputram etad avocat :
S04n550:1086: tadyathāpi nāma āyuṣmañ śāriputra jātyandhasya puruṣasya purastāt kaścid eva sarvarūpagatāny upadarśayet / na ca tatra sa jātyandha ekarūpam api paśyet / evam eva āyuṣmañ śāriputra ihācintyavimokṣe nirdiśyamāne sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā iha jātyandhā iva cakṣurvihīnā ekasminn apy acintyakāraṇe na pratyakṣāḥ / ko nāma vidvān imam acintyaṃ vimokṣaṃ śrutvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpādayet / tat kiṃ nu bhūyaḥ kariṣyāmo 'tyantopahatendriyā dagdhavinaṣṭānīva bījāny abhājanībhūtā iha mahāyāne / sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvā rudadbhis trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur vijñāpayitavyaḥ / sarvabodhisatvaiś ca pramuditair imam acintyavimokṣaṃ śrutvā mūrdhnā saṃpratyetavyaḥ,
S04n550:1087: adhimuktibalaṃ ca samjanayitavyam / yasyaiṣācintyavimokṣādhimuktiḥ sarvamāras tasya kiṃ kariṣyanti / imaṃ nirdeśaṃ nirdiśataḥ sthavirasya mahākāśyapasya dvātriṃśatā devaputrasahasrair anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpannāni /
S04n550:1088: $20 atha vimalakīrtir licchaviḥ sthāviraṃ mahākāśyapam evam āha :
S04n550:1089: yāvanto bhadantamahākāśyapa daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu mārā māratvaṃ kārayanti,
S04n550:1090: sarve te yadbhūyasācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā upāyakauśalyena satvaparipācanāya māratvaṃ kārayanti / yāvadbhir bhadantamahākāśyapa daśasu dikṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu bodhisatvā yācanakair yācyante hastapādān vā karṇanāsaṃ vā śoṇitaṃ snāyuṃ vāsthimajjānaṃ vā netrāṇi vottamāṇgāni śirāṃsi vāṇgapratyaṇgāni vā rājyarāṣṭrajanapadān vā bhāryāputraduhiṭṛr vā dāsadāsīr vā hayagajarathavāhanāni vā suvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṇkhaśilāpravāḍamaṇiratnajātaṃ vānnapānāni rasān vā,
S04n550:1092: sarve te yācanakā yadbhūyasācintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā bodhisatvā upāyakauśalyenemāṃ dṛḍhādhyāśayatāṃ darśayanti / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / ugratapaso hi bhadantamahākāśyapa bodhisatvās ta evaṃ darśayanti / nāsti hi prākṛtajanasyāsthānānavakāśakṛtasya bodhisatvam utpīḍayitum /
S04n550:1093: tadyathāpi nāma bhadantamahākāśyapa na śaktir asti khadyotakasya sūryamaṇḍalaprabhām abhibhavitum / evam eva bhadantamahākāśyapa na śaktir asti prākṛtasya janasya bodhisatvenānavakāśakṛtasyopasamkramituṃ yācituṃ vā / tadyathā bhadantamahākāśyapa yo hastināgasya prahāro na sa śakyo gardabhena soḍhum / evam eva bhadantamahākāśyapa na śakyam abodhisatvena bodhisatvasyotpīḍanaṃ soḍhum / bodhisatva eva bodhisatvotpīḍāṃ sahate / ayam bhadantamahākāśyapa acintyavimokṣapratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisatvānām upāyajñānabalapraveśaḥ //
S04n550:1096: $1 atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim etad avocat :
S04n550:1098: āha : tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ vijñapuruṣa udakacandram avekṣeta,
S04n550:1099: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvā avekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalam ālokayet,
S04n550:1100: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvā avekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ marīcikāyām udakam,
S04n550:1101: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvā avekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ māyākāro māyākāranirmitaṃ puruṣam avekṣeta,
S04n550:1102: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvā avekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ pratiśrutkāyā rutaghoṣaḥ,
S04n550:1103: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvā avekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ gagane 'bhrakūṭam,
S04n550:1104: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ phenapiṇḍsaya pūrvāntaḥ,
S04n550:1105: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ udakabudbudānām utpādavyayaḥ,
S04n550:1106: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kadalyāḥ sāradarśanam,
S04n550:1107: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvastavāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ vidyutaḥ samkrāntiḥ,
S04n550:1108: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ pañcamo dhātuḥ,
S04n550:1109: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ saptamam āyatanam,
S04n550:1110: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ ārūpyeṣu rūpāvabhāsaḥ,
S04n550:1111: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ paritaptānāṃ bījānām aṇkurapariniṣpattiḥ,
S04n550:1112: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ maṇḍūkaromapravāraḥ,
S04n550:1113: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ mṛtasya kāmakrīḍāratiḥ,
S04n550:1114: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvastavāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ srotaāpannasya satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ,
S04n550:1115: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ sakṛdāgāminas tṛtīyo bhavaḥ,
S04n550:1116: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ anāgāmino garbhāvakrāntiḥ,
S04n550:1117: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ arhataḥ rāgadoṣamohāḥ,
S04n550:1118: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ kṣāntipratilabdhasya bodhisatvasya mātsaryadauḥśīlyavyāpādavihiṃsācittani,
S04n550:1119: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatasya kleśavāsanā,
S04n550:1120: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ jātyandhasya puruṣasya rūpadarśanam,
S04n550:1121: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ nirodhasamāpannasyāśvāsāḥ,
S04n550:1122: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ ākāśe śakunipadam,
S04n550:1123: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ paṇḍakasyendriyasya prādurbhāvaḥ,
S04n550:1124: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ bandhyāyāḥ putrapratilambhaḥ,
S04n550:1125: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatanirmitasyānutpannāḥ kleśāḥ,
S04n550:1126: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ svapnadarśanapratibuddhasya darśanam,
S04n550:1127: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ aparikalpayataḥ kleśāḥ,
S04n550:1128: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ anupādānasyāgneḥ saṃbhavaḥ,
S04n550:1129: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / tadyathā mañjuśrīḥ parinirvṛtasya pratisamdhiḥ,
S04n550:1130: evaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ / evaṃ hi mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ /
S04n550:1131: $2 āha : yadi kulaputraivaṃ bodhisatvena sarvasatvāḥ pratyavekṣitavyāḥ,
S04n550:1132: kathaṃ punar asya mahāmaitrī bhavati sarvasatveṣu /
S04n550:1133: āha: yadā mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatva evaṃ pratyavekṣate,
S04n550:1134: mayā hy eṣāṃ satvānām evaṃ dharmaparijñāyai dharmo deśayitavya iti,
S04n550:1163: saukhyamaitrī buddhasaukhyapratiṣṭhāpanatayā / iyaṃ mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvasya mahāmaitrī /
S04n550:1165: āha : yat kṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvebhya utsṛjati /
S04n550:1172: āha : saṃsārabhayabhītena mañjuśrīḥ bodhisatvena buddhamāhātmyaṃ pratipattavyam /
S04n550:1179: āha : kleśān utsraṣṭukāmena kathaṃ prayuktena bhavitavyam /
S04n550:1180: āha : kleśān utsraṣṭukāmena yoniśaḥ prayuktena bhavitavyam /
S04n550:1181: āha : kathaṃ prayuktaḥ punar yoniśaḥ prayukto bhavati /
S04n550:1189: āha : satkāyasya ca punaḥ kiṃ mūlam /
S04n550:1198: āha : yan mañjuśrīḥ apratiṣṭhānaṃ tasya kiṃ mūlaṃ bhaviṣyati / iti hy apratiṣṭhānamūlapratiṣṭhitāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
S04n550:1199: $7 atha yā tatra gṛhe devatā prativasati,
S04n550:1200: sā teṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānām imaṃ dharmanirdeśaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭodagrāttamanā,
S04n550:1201: audārikam ātmabhāvaṃ samdarśya divyaiḥ puṣpais tān mahāsatvāṃs tāṃś ca mahāśrāvakān abhyavakirati sma / abhyavakīrṇānāṃ ca tatra yāni bodhisatvānāṃ kāye puṣpāṇi patitāni,
S04n550:1202: tāni dharaṇitale pratiṣṭhitāni / yāni punar mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ kāye puṣpāṇi patitāni,
S04n550:1203: tāni tatraiva sthitāni na bhūmau patitāni / tatas te mahāśrāvakā ṛddhiprātihāryaiḥ tāni puṣpāṇy utsṛjanti,
S04n550:1205: $8 atha sā devatāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram evam āha :
S04n550:1207: āha : akalpikāni devate etāni puṣpāṇi / tasmād aham etāni puṣpāṇy apanayāmi /
S04n550:1208: devatāha : mā bhadantaśāriputra evaṃ vocaḥ / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / etāni hi puṣpāṇi kalpikāni / kiṃ kāraṇam / tathā hy etāni puṣpāṇi na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti / sthaviraḥ punaḥ śāriputraḥ kalpayati vikalpayati ca / ye bhadantaśāriputra svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāṃ kalpayanti vikalpayanti ca,
S04n550:1209: te 'kalpikāḥ / sthaviras tu kalpayati vikalpayati ca / ye punar na kalpayanti na vikalpayanti,
S04n550:1210: te kalpikāḥ / paśya bhadantaśariputra eṣāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ kāye puṣpāṇi na śliṣyanti / yathāpi nāma sarvakalpavikalpaprahīṇatvāt / tadyathāpi nāma bhīrukajātīyasya puruṣasyāmanuṣyā avatāraṃ labhante / evam eva saṃsārabhayabhītānāṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāny avatāraṃ labhante / ye punaḥ sarvasaṃsārakleśabhayavigatāḥ,
S04n550:1211: kiṃ teṣāṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyāni kariṣyanti / yeṣāṃ vāsanāprahīṇā,
S04n550:1212: teṣāṃ kāye puṣpāṇi śliṣyanti / tasmāt sarvavāsanāprahīṇānāṃ kāye puṣpāṇi na śliṣyanti /
S04n550:1213: $9 atha khalv āyuṣmāñ śāriputras tāṃ devatām etad avocat :
S04n550:1214: kiyacciraniviṣṭā punas tvaṃ devate iha gṛhe /
S04n550:1216: āha : na cirasthitā tvaṃ devate iha gṛhe /
S04n550:1219: āha : kim idānīṃ mahāprajñānām agryaḥ sthāviras tūṣṇīm abhūt / prāptakālaṃ praśanaṃ na visarjayati /
S04n550:1220: āha : apravyāhārā hi devate vimuktiḥ / tan na jāne kim vyāharāmīti /
S04n550:1221: āha : yad yad eva sthaviro 'kṣaram udāharati,
S04n550:1222: sarvāṇy etāny akṣarāṇi vimuktilakṣaṇāni / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / yā hi sā vimuktiḥ,
S04n550:1223: sā nādhyātmaṃ na bahir nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate / evam akṣarāṇy api / tasmāt tarhi bhadantaśāriputra mā akṣarāpanayena vimuktiṃ nirdiśa / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / sarvadharmasamatā hi vimuktiḥ /
S04n550:1225: devatāha : abhimānikānām eṣa nirdeṣo rāgadoṣamohavigamād vimuktir iti / ye nirabhimānikāḥ,
S04n550:1227: $10 atha khalv āyuṣmāñ śāriputras tāṃ devatām etad avocat :
S04n550:1228: sādhu sādhu devate kiṃ tvayā prāptaṃ kiṃ vā sākṣātkṛtam,
S04n550:1230: āha : na mayā bhadantaśāriputra kimcit prāptam sākṣātkṛtaṃ vā / tena ma īdṛśaṃ pratibhānam / yeṣām evaṃ bhavaty asmābhiḥ prāptaṃ vā sākṣātkṛtaṃ ceti,
S04n550:1231: te svākhyāte dharmavinaya ābhimānikā iti ucyante /
S04n550:1232: $11 āha : kiṃ tvaṃ devate śrāvakayānikā pratyekabuddhayānikā mahāyānikā vā /
S04n550:1236: $12 api tu khalu punar bhadantaśāriputra na campakavanaṃ praviṣṭā eraṇḍagandhaṃ jighranti / campakavanaṃ tu praviṣṭāś campakagandham eva jighranti / evam eva bhadantaśāriputra neha gṛhe buddhadharmaguṇagandhike vasantaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhagandhaṃ jighranti / ye 'pi bhadantaśāriputra śakrabrahmalokapālā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā idaṃ gṛhaṃ praviśanti,
S04n550:1237: te 'py asya satpuruṣasya dharmaśravaṇena buddhadharmaguṇagandhenotpāditabodhicittā niṣkrāmanti / dvādaśavarṣāṇy upādāya bhadantaśāriputra prativasantyā me na jātu śrāvakapratyekabuddhasaṃprayuktā kathā śrutapūrvā,
S04n550:1239: $13 iha bhadantaśāriputra gṛhe 'ṣṭāv āścaryādbhutā dharmāḥ satatasamitaṃ samdṛśyante / katame 'ṣṭau /
S04n550:1240: neha rātrir vā divaso vā prajñāyate sadāvabhāsitam idaṃ gṛhaṃ suvarṇavarṇayā prabhayā / neha sūryācandramasau prajñāyete,
S04n550:1241: na bhrājete / ayaṃ prathama āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ /
S04n550:1242: punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra ye praviśantīdaṃ gṛham,
S04n550:1243: teṣāṃ samanantarapraviṣṭānāṃ sarvakleśā na bādhante / ayaṃ dvitīya āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ /
S04n550:1244: punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra idaṃ gṛham avirahitaṃ śakrabrahmalokapālair anyabuddhakṣetrasamnipatitaiś ca bodhisatvaiḥ / ayaṃ tṛtīya āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ /
S04n550:1245: punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra idaṃ gṛhaṃ satatasamitam avirahitaṃ dharmaśravaṇena ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktayā kathayāvivartyadharmakathayā ca / ayaṃ caturtha āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ /
S04n550:1246: punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra iha gṛhe yās tūryasamgītayo divyamānuṣyakāṇi vā vādyāni vādyante,
S04n550:1247: tebhyas tūryebhyo 'pramāṇo dharmaśabdanirhāro niścarati sārvakālikaḥ / ayaṃ pañcama āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ /
S04n550:1248: punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra iha gṛhe catvāri mahānidhānāni sarvaratnaparipūrṇāny akṣayāṇi yato niṣyandaṃ sarvadaridrakṛpaṇā ādāya prakrāmanti,
S04n550:1249: na ca kṣīyante / ayaṃ ṣaṣṭha āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ /
S04n550:1250: punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra iha gṛhe śākyamunis tathāgato 'mitābho 'kṣobhyo ratnaśrī ratnārcī ratnacandro ratnavyūho duḥprasahaḥ sarvārthasiddhaḥ prabhūtaratnaḥ siṃhanādanādī siṃhaghoṣas tathāgata evaṃ pramukhā daśasu dikṣv apramāṇās tathāgatā ye 'sya satpuruṣasya cintitamātreṇāgacchanti / āgatya ca tathāgataguhyaṃ nāma dharmamukhapraveśaṃ deśayitvā prakrāmanti / ayaṃ saptama āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ /
S04n550:1251: punar aparaṃ bhadantaśāriputra iha gṛhe sarvadevabhavanavyūhāḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhāś ca samdṛśyante / ayam aṣṭama āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ /
S04n550:1252: ime bhadantaśāriputra aṣṭāv āścaryādbhutā dharmāḥ satatasamitam iha gṛhe samdṛśyante / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / ka imām acintyadharmatāṃ paśyañ śrāvakadharmatāyai spṛhayet /
S04n550:1253: $14 āha : kiṃ tvaṃ devate strībhāvaṃ na nivartayasi /
S04n550:1254: āha : paripūrṇāni me dvādaśavarṣāny upādāya strībhāvaṃ paryeṣamāṇāyā na cainaṃ labhe / api ca bhadantaśārīputra yā māyākāreṇa strīnirmitā yas tām evaṃ vadet :
S04n550:1257: āha : na tasyāḥ kācit bhūtā pariniṣpattiḥ /
S04n550:1258: āha : evam eva bhadantaśāriputra apariniṣpanneṣu sarvadharmeṣu māyānirmitasvabhāveṣu kutas tavaivaṃ bhavati :
S04n550:1260: $15 atha sā devatā tādṛśaṃ adhiṣṭhānam adhitiṣṭhati sma / yathā sthāviraḥ śāriputro yādṛśī sā devatā tādṛśaḥ samdṛśyate,
S04n550:1261: sā devatā yādṛśaḥ sthaviras tādṛśī samdṛśyate / atha sā devatā śāriputrarūpā śāriputraṃ devatārūpadhāriṇam apṛcchat :
S04n550:1264: na jāne kiṃ vinivartayāmīti / puruṣarūpam antarhitaṃ strīrūpaṃ me nirvṛttam /
S04n550:1265: āha : yadi sthaviraḥ śakṣyati strībhāvaṃ vinivartayitum ,
S04n550:1266: tataḥ sarvāḥ striyo 'pi strībhāvaṃ vinivartayiṣyanti / yathā sthaviro na strī strīva samdṛśyate,
S04n550:1267: evaṃ sarvastrīṇām api strīrūpaṃ na ca striyaḥ strīrūpāś ca samdṛśyante / idaṃ samdhāya bhagavān āha :
S04n550:1269: atha sā devatā tad adhiṣṭhānam avāsṛjat / athāyuṣmāñ śāriputraḥ punar eva svarūpasamanvāgato babhūva / atha sā devatāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram evam āha :
S04n550:1270: kva nu te bhadantaśāriputra strīrūpaṃ kṛtaṃ gatam /
S04n550:1271: āha : na tat kṛtaṃ na vikṛtam /
S04n550:1272: āha : evam eva sarvadharmā na kṛtā na vikṛtāḥ / yatra ca na kṛtir na vikṛtis tad buddhavacanam /
S04n550:1273: $16 āha : itas tvaṃ devate cyutā kutropapatsyase /
S04n550:1277: āha : evam eva sarvadharmāṇāṃ na cyutir nopapattiḥ /
S04n550:1278: āha : kiyaccireṇa punar devate bodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase /
S04n550:1281: āha : asthānam etad devate yad ahaṃ pṛthagjanadharmasamanvāgataḥ syām /
S04n550:1282: āha : evam eva bhadantaśāriputra asthānam etad yad ahaṃ bodhim abhisaṃbhotsye / tat kasmād dhetoḥ / asthānasthitaiva hi bodhiḥ/ tasmād asthānaṃ na kaścid abhisaṃbhotsyate /
S04n550:1284: uktaṃ devate tathāgatena “gaṇgānadīvālikāsamās tathāgatā abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyante 'bhisaṃbhotsyante ca“ /
S04n550:1285: devatāha : akṣaragaṇanāsamketādhivacanam etad bhadantaśāriputra atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā iti / na punar buddhā atītā vānāgatā vā vartamānā vā / tryadhvasamatikrāntā hi bodhiḥ / api ca prāptaṃ sthavireṇārhattvam /
S04n550:1288: $17 atha vimalakīrtir licchavir āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram evam āha :
S04n550:1289: dvānavatibuddhakoṭīparyupāsitā bhadantaśāriputra eṣā devatābhijñājñānavikrīḍitā praṇidhānasamucchritā kṣāntipratilabdhāvaivartikasamavasaraṇā praṇidhānavaśena yathecchati tathā tiṣṭhati satvaparipākāya //
S04n550:1292: $1 atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto vimalakīrtiṃ licchavim evam āha :
